reviewText: More of a "Bono is God" propaganda DVD than anything else.  But also very interesting.  For U2 fanatics like myself, very enlightening.
Loved this and how he helps the world by using his "celebrity" status
Loved hearing Bono's explanation of how he uses his celebrity status as currency to get things done.
A great documentary on an iconic band! Learned a lot about these beloved band members. Definitely worth the watch!

If you have been a fan of U2, music, or any group...skip this film.  There are so many reasons.  My main gripe...it is not well researched; instead, it has simply nabbed headlines, mainly about Bono.  I could not finish it.  It is that bad.  This was not a film about U2...although they were mentioned.
A fantastic band that I have been following since the 80s and worked for in the late 80s. I simply enjoy their music and look foward to more excellent music.
